name: Any Journey
description:
Any Journey is a procedurally generated role-playing game that I worked on for 8 months whilst documenting all of my progress on YouTube.

Features include:

  • Procedural World Generation
  • Factions to join and conquer the world with
  • A Borderlands-esque loot system with 1.000+ possible weapons and armors
  • NPCs with procedural quests
  • Geo-politics
  • Merchants
  • Skill trees
  • Top-down combat
  • Arenas

The game requires the Java JRE to run. I made it from scratch using Java and OpenGL. It was never finished, so it will crash and bug out on you. Regardless, it would be a shame not to offer it to the world.

Stuff that doesn't work:

  • Saving and loading
  • War between factions
  • And there are very very many bugs, many of which will crash your game.

Also, all developer cheats are still in the game, so try and figure out for yourself what the different buttons on your keyboard do. Spoiler: many of them will crash your game.

If you want to see the devlog series for this game click here.

If you want to read more about this game click here.

Enjoy!
